title: Fights (CRE113)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In our thirteenth episode, storytellers share stories about fights, spats, tussles, struggles, scrapes, disputes, and wars. It features stories from writer Ellen Tarlin (Slate), comedian Zach Broussard, improv impresario Matt Higgins (Centralia), comedian Catie Lazarus (Employee of the Month), and RISK! creator and host Kevin Allison (The State). 

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Ellen Tarlin, Catie Lazarus, Sex Mob, Chris Hola, Zach Broussard, Ninja Sex Party, Marshall York, Kevin Allison, Matt Higgins, Leibya Rogers)
